titleStmt.title: Quæries proposd for the agitators in the Army (or their assistants elsewhere, who are intrusted, or do intermeddle in those high matters of peace and warre) more than foure moneths ago, and now published in pursuit of satisfaction, and with intent of profit towards all, and the state.
titleStmt.author: Jackson, Richard, 1621-1677.
